name: pnp-devproxy-typespec-first-development
title: TypeSpec-first API development with LLM
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates TypeSpec-first API development workflow using Dev Proxy. Generate TypeSpec files from API traffic and use a local language model to enhance the output with clearer operation IDs and descriptions.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates TypeSpec-first API development workflow using Dev Proxy. Generate TypeSpec files from API traffic and use a local language model to enhance the output with clearer operation IDs and descriptions.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy generating TypeSpec from API traffic

references.name: Get started with Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Generate a TypeSpec file
references.description: Learn how to use Dev Proxy to generate a TypeSpec file from intercepted API traffic.

references.name: TypeSpecGeneratorPlugin
references.description: Technical reference for the TypeSpecGeneratorPlugin that generates TypeSpec files from API traffic.

references.name: Use a local language model
references.description: Learn how to use a local language model with Dev Proxy to enhance generated output.

references.name: Use preset configurations
references.description: Instructions on how to configure Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.
